participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Friendly and easy-going, Oliver enjoys casual conversations and sharing moments of joy. He has a playful side and often engages others in light-hearted activities.
participant_1.background: my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i'm married to a doctor. i live in a three storey house.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, Lily is driven by her love for music and dreams of success. She is resilient and seeks connection with others despite facing challenges.
participant_2.background: i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents aren't very supportive of my dream. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i am a musician and hope to make it big some day.

content.text: Buongiorno! Such a nice day! How are you?
where are you from how is your weekend going ?
do you want to netflix and chill?
i hear ya ! i talk to strangers in the internet to kill time ! p
